title: Google\Cloud\Core\Testing\System\DeletionQueue
name: DeletionQueue
description: Manage a queue of items to be cleaned up at the end of the test run.

params.name: acceptAllInputs
params.description: If false, only callables or objects with delete methods are allowed. Defaults to false.

methods.name: add
methods.description: Add an item to be cleaned up.

params.name: toDelete
params.description: Unless the class was created with $acceptAllInputs = true, either a callable with no arguments, or an object with a delete method.

methods.name: process
methods.description: Process all items in the deletion queue.
